newsitem.title: USA: U.S. Sunflower Market Weekly Review -- May 9.
newsitem.headline: U.S. Sunflower Market Weekly Review -- May 9.

text.p: National Sunflower Summary -- USDA Market News Services.
Weekly Trends: Sunflower Seeds were mixed, 25 cents lower to 15 cents higher.
Sunflower Meal was steady to 5.00 lower.
Sunflower Oil was steady to 50 points lower.
